title: Functions
concept: This level focuses on writing and using functions in C. You will practice functions with and without return values, functions with parameters, and using them to perform modular computations like max, factorial, prime check, etc.

challenges.title: Square using Function
challenges.description: Write a function int square(int n) that returns n*n. In main(), read n and print the result.

challenges.title: Max of Two (Function)
challenges.description: Write a function int max2(int a, int b) that returns the larger of the two. Use it in main().

challenges.title: Factorial Function
challenges.description: Write a function long long fact(int n) that returns n!. Use a loop inside the function.

challenges.title: Prime Check Function
challenges.description: Write a function int isPrime(int n) that returns 1 if prime, else 0. In main(), print Yes or No.

challenges.title: Sum of Array using Function
challenges.description: Write a function int sumArray(int arr[], int n) that returns sum of elements. Call it from main.

challenges.title: Reverse Number using Function
challenges.description: Write int reverseNum(int n) that returns the reversed integer.

challenges.title: GCD using Function
challenges.description: Write int gcd(int a, int b) that returns greatest common divisor using Euclidean algorithm.

challenges.title: LCM using Function
challenges.description: Using gcd() function, write int lcm(int a, int b) that returns LCM.

challenges.title: isPalindrome Number (Function)
challenges.description: Write int isPal(int n) that returns 1 if n is palindrome, else 0.

challenges.title: Calculator using Functions
challenges.description: Create functions add, sub, mul, divi and perform operation based on operator.
